alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox; Marshall; Peoria; Schuyler; Stark; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 3:08AM CST until February 16 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, sleet accumulations less than a quarter inch, and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting 30 to 35 mph could produce blowing and drifting snow northwest of the IL river this afternoon and evening, especially in rural open areas of Knox and Stark counties. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Illinois. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute today.
info.instruction: If traveling today and evening, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com

area.areaDesc: Fulton; Knox; Marshall; Peoria; Schuyler; Stark; Tazewell; Woodford
